text: Eshanosaurus is an extinct genus of therizinosaur dinosaur from the Lower Jurassic of China. It may have been the earliest known coelurosaur. The type species is Eshanosaurus deguchiianus, which was coined in 2001 by Xu Xing.Xu, X., Zhao, X. and Clark, J.M. (2001). "A new therizinosaur from the Lower Jurassic Lower Lufeng Formation of Yunnan, China." Journal of Vertebrate Paleontology, 21(3): 477â€“483. ==References== Category:Dinosaurs
title: Eshanosaurus
